Registry of Open Data on AWS

Global Surface Summary of Day

agriculture climate environmental natural resource regulatory sustainability weather

Description

GSOD is a collection of daily weather measurements (temperature, wind speed, humidity, pressure, and more) from 9000+ weather stations around the world.

Update Frequency

Currently updated infrequently. Last updated on September 13, 2016.

License

The data is intended for free and unrestricted use in research, education, and other non-commercial activities. Per World Meteorological Organization (WMO) Resolution 40, redistribution of these data by others must provide this same notification, and non-U.S. data cannot be redistributed for commercial purposes.

Documentation

http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/

Contact

http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    Measurements and metadata
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::aws-gsod
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://aws-gsod/ --no-sign-request
